thread.section_title: Classics Hotel Parc des Expositions - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Issy-les-Moulineaux, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel, amazing staff
thread.title_full: Great Hotel, amazing staff - Review of Classics Hotel Parc des Expositions, Issy-les-Moulineaux, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maryem B
title: Great Hotel, amazing staff
text:
I have stayed at the Classics Hotel for a business trip, it a great Hotel, clean rooms, very quiet neighborhood and amazing staff. very warm and welcoming.
it's a great place to work, they had issues with Wifi but i was able to use the 5G that they provided me.
I enjoyed every part of my stay there.
